page.title: 16Entertainment in Monmouth
page.content: There is a fine{sports ground}which caters for rugby, soccer, cricket, tennis, bowls and putting. Monmouth Rowing Club has a fine boathouse on the River Wye and organises the Annual Regatta.{Monmouth Leisure Centre}is happy to provide facilities both educational and sporting for any group visiting the area. {Music}is well catered for in Monmouth. The Merlin Society holds a series of concerts in Monmouth School Hall from September to May each year and artists of world renown are engaged. The Magic Lantern Theatre in Church Street is popular with tourists. {The Monmouthshire Show}is always held on the last Thursday in August each year. It is a very popular show and regularly attracts over 20,000 visitors.
